rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Open space near the entrance for receiving guests and providing a transition between outdoors and interiors, aligning with Vastu principles by placing this area in the north-east to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: A multipurpose open space that combines living and dining areas. Designed as a minimalist layout with built-in storage and sleek finishes. Vastu suggests this area be oriented towards the south-east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact, efficiently planned kitchen with modern amenities and ample storage. Vastu principles recommend placing this area in the south-west to promote well-being.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated study/library space with comfortable seating and adequate lighting. Designed as a quiet retreat from the living areas, located in the north to harness positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A modest guest bathroom near the entrance for convenience. Vastu suggests placing bathrooms in the south-west to help maintain a balance of energies.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: The main door is positioned in the north-east to welcome positive energy and align with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: A balcony provides access to a partial view of the garden, promoting a connection with nature while ensuring privacy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation. Placed in the north-west to ensure calmness and a conducive sleep environment according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for guests or family members. Placed in the east to maintain balance and energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with essential fixtures, placed near the master bedroom for convenience.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A modern staircase designed for safe and easy access between floors, placed centrally to allow even energy distribution.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: Provides views of the garden. The placement helps invite positive energy into living spaces.

plot.description: A spacious plot ideal for a minimalist bungalow with ample outdoor space. Landscaped to include a large garden and open area.

vastu_considerations: Main entrance in the north-east to invite positive energy.
Kitchen placed in the south-west for harmony.
Library situated in the north to foster focus and learning.
